import '../navigation/navigation.styles.scss' import { Fragment } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { userContext } from '../../context/user.context' const Navigation = () => { const { currentUser } = useContext(userContext) console.log(currentUser) return (
Shop {currentUser ? ( Sign Out ) : ( Sign In )}
) } export default Navigation
